name: Abandoned_gas_station
text:
Abandoned gas station
An abandoned gas station was located at 1400 River Road in Twin Peaks, Washington.
History
On November 10, 1985, Laura Palmer saw a vision of 1400 River Road, and she rode there on her pony Troy. When Laura arrived, she encountered Margaret Lanterman, who told Laura of several things she knew about her and of owls.
